articles.description: Champions League news and reaction after Manchester City throw away 3-0 lead in home draw with Feyenood while Arsen
articles.title: Champions League reaction: Man City squander lead, Pep Guardiola, Arsenal thrash Sporting

articles.description: Pep Guardiola says his Man City side are "fragile", while they are also labelled "weak" and "frail" after surrendering a 3-0 Champions League lead against Feyenoord at Etihad Stadium.
articles.title: Man City 3-3 Feyenoord: Pep Guardiola's side 'fragile', 'weak' and 'frail' after draw

articles.description: Arsenal get back to winning ways in the Champions League with a commanding victory over Sporting at Estadio Jose Alvalade.
articles.title: Sporting 1-5 Arsenal: Bukayo Saka stars as Gunners get back to winning ways in Champions League

articles.description: Miami Dolphins star Tyreek Hill had his case dismissed after the officer failed to show in court.
articles.title: Traffic ticket dropped for NFL star Tyreek Hill, who was handcuffed before game

articles.description: Captain Ben Stokes says he opted out of the Indian Premier League auction in order to prolong his England career.
articles.title: Ben Stokes opted out of Indian Premier League to prolong England career

articles.description: The Football Association says it is investigating an allegation that referee David Coote discussed giving a yellow card with a fan before a Championship match.
articles.title: David Coote: FA investigates referee over Leeds yellow card claims

articles.description: Spanish football expert Guillem Balague explains the three problems puzzling manager Carlo Ancelotti at Real Madrid.
articles.title: Champions League: Three problems Real Madrid need to solve

articles.description: Inter Milan win their fourth Champions League game in a row with a narrow victory over winless RB Leipzig.
articles.title: Inter Milan 1-0 RB Leipzig: Castello Lukeba scores own goal

articles.description: With Kylian Mbappe not yet at his best and the in-form Vinicius Jr out injured, is this Liverpool's best chance to beat Real Madrid since 2009?
articles.title: Champions League: Do Liverpool have their best chance of beating Real Madrid in 15 years?

articles.description: Michael Johnson's Grand Slam Track is set for its inaugural season in 2025 - but what is it all about, what does it mean for athletics and will it come to the UK?
articles.title: Grand Slam Track: Michael Johnson says 'I think I can save track, not track and field'
